description:
An ultra-fast, user-friendly, and compatible grep replacement

An ultra-fast, user-friendly grep replacement.
Ugrep combines the best features of other grep, adds new things, and surpasses their search speeds.
Includes a TUI, boolean queries (AND/OR/NOT), fuzzy search, hexdumps, searches nested archives (cpio/tar/pax/zip), compressed files (zip/gz/Z/bz2/lzma/xz/lz4/zstd), pdfs, docs, and more
Fix #434 ugrep v7 regression bug: an issue with the regex ^ anchor due to a misaligned begin-of-line position in the buffer after the buffer shifts on large input files. As a result, the -v option did not always work properly on large input files when searching with regex ^ anchors.
